actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to authorize election of health benefits coverage by employees and annuitants for themselves and their spouses at a special rate based on coverage of two persons.

summary.text: Authorizes the election of health benefits coverage by Federal employees and annuitants for themselves and their spouses at a special rate based on the coverage of two persons. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8903, 8905, 8906)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to authorize election of health benefits coverage by employees and annuitants for themselves and their spouses at a special rate based on coverage of two persons.
